body:
**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:
/kind bug


**What happened**:

The `ownerReferences` section for my `ResourceQuota` was stripped, but left for all other resource types

**What you expected to happen**:

`kubectl apply` should put my changes into the cluster as requested

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:

Here are the resources (Note you will need to change the ownerReference UID and name to some object that exists in your cluster)
```
(minikube/default) tmp $ cat mike.yaml 
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  name: safety
  namespace: default
  ownerReferences:
  - {apiVersion: k8s.osp.tech/v1, blockOwnerDeletion: true, controller: true, kind: BundleDeployment,
    name: pipeline.804794, uid: e81ecd21-d3c2-11e8-a99c-0800270f3029}
spec:
  hard: {configmaps: '5'}
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: mike
  namespace: default
  ownerReferences:
  - {apiVersion: k8s.osp.tech/v1, blockOwnerDeletion: true, controller: true, kind: BundleDeployment,
    name: pipeline.804794, uid: e81ecd21-d3c2-11e8-a99c-0800270f3029}

```

Observe applying misses out the `ownerReference` for the `ResourceQuota`:
```
(minikube/default) tmp $ k apply -f mike.yaml; k get -f mike.yaml -o yaml
resourcequota "safety" created
configmap "mike" created
apiVersion: v1
items:
- apiVersion: v1
  kind: ResourceQuota
  metadata:
    annotations:
      kubectl.kubernetes.io/last-applied-configuration: |
        {"apiVersion":"v1","kind":"ResourceQuota","metadata":{"annotations":{},"name":"safety","namespace":"default","ownerReferences":[{"apiVersion":"k8s.osp.tech/v1","blockOwnerDeletion":true,"controller":true,"kind":"BundleDeployment","name":"pipeline.804794","uid":"e81ecd21-d3c2-11e8-a99c-0800270f3029"}]},"spec":{"hard":{"configmaps":"5"}}}
    creationTimestamp: 2018-10-19T18:05:45Z
    name: safety
    namespace: default
    resourceVersion: "2754558"
    selfLink: /api/v1/namespaces/default/resourcequotas/safety
    uid: 99d6a40c-d3c9-11e8-8b29-0800270f3029
  spec:
    hard:
      configmaps: "5"
  status:
    hard:
      configmaps: "5"
    used:
      configmaps: "0"
- apiVersion: v1
  kind: ConfigMap
  metadata:
    annotations:
      kubectl.kubernetes.io/last-applied-configuration: |
        {"apiVersion":"v1","kind":"ConfigMap","metadata":{"annotations":{},"name":"mike","namespace":"default","ownerReferences":[{"apiVersion":"k8s.osp.tech/v1","blockOwnerDeletion":true,"controller":true,"kind":"BundleDeployment","name":"pipeline.804794","uid":"e81ecd21-d3c2-11e8-a99c-0800270f3029"}]}}
    creationTimestamp: 2018-10-19T18:05:45Z
    name: mike
    namespace: default
    ownerReferences:
    - apiVersion: k8s.osp.tech/v1
      blockOwnerDeletion: true
      controller: true
      kind: BundleDeployment
      name: pipeline.804794
      uid: e81ecd21-d3c2-11e8-a99c-0800270f3029
    resourceVersion: "2754559"
    selfLink: /api/v1/namespaces/default/configmaps/mike
    uid: 99d96690-d3c9-11e8-8b29-0800270f3029
kind: List
metadata:
  resourceVersion: ""
  selfLink: ""
```

Observe doing this again updates it correctly:
```
(minikube/default) tmp $ k apply -f mike.yaml; k get -f mike.yaml -o yaml
resourcequota "safety" configured
configmap "mike" unchanged                                               
apiVersion: v1                
items:                  
- apiVersion: v1        
  kind: ResourceQuota
  metadata:
    annotations:
      kubectl.kubernetes.io/last-applied-configuration: |
        {"apiVersion":"v1","kind":"ResourceQuota","metadata":{"annotations":{},"name":"safety","namespace":"default","ownerReferences":[{"apiVersion":"k8s.osp.tech/v1","blockOwnerDeletion":true,"controlle
r":true,"kind":"BundleDeployment","name":"pipeline.804794","uid":"e81ecd21-d3c2-11e8-a99c-0800270f3029"}]},"spec":{"hard":{"configmaps":"5"}}}
    creationTimestamp: 2018-10-19T18:05:45Z
    name: safety
    namespace: default
    ownerReferences:
    - apiVersion: k8s.osp.tech/v1
      blockOwnerDeletion: true
      controller: true
      kind: BundleDeployment
      name: pipeline.804794
      uid: e81ecd21-d3c2-11e8-a99c-0800270f3029
    resourceVersion: "2754599"
    selfLink: /api/v1/namespaces/default/resourcequotas/safety
    uid: 99d6a40c-d3c9-11e8-8b29-0800270f3029
  spec:
    hard:
      configmaps: "5"
  status:
    hard:
      configmaps: "5"
    used:
      configmaps: "0"
- apiVersion: v1
  kind: ConfigMap
  metadata:
    annotations:
      kubectl.kubernetes.io/last-applied-configuration: |
        {"apiVersion":"v1","kind":"ConfigMap","metadata":{"annotations":{},"name":"mike","namespace":"default","ownerReferences":[{"apiVersion":"k8s.osp.tech/v1","blockOwnerDeletion":true,"controller":true,"kind":"BundleDeployment","name":"pipeline.804794","uid":"e81ecd21-d3c2-11e8-a99c-0800270f3029"}]}}
    creationTimestamp: 2018-10-19T18:05:45Z
    name: mike
    namespace: default
    ownerReferences:
    - apiVersion: k8s.osp.tech/v1
      blockOwnerDeletion: true
      controller: true
      kind: BundleDeployment
      name: pipeline.804794
      uid: e81ecd21-d3c2-11e8-a99c-0800270f3029
    resourceVersion: "2754559"
    selfLink: /api/v1/namespaces/default/configmaps/mike
    uid: 99d96690-d3c9-11e8-8b29-0800270f3029
kind: List
metadata:
  resourceVersion: ""
  selfLink: ""

```

**Anything else we need to know?**:

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
```
(minikube/default) tmp $ kubectl version
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"9", GitVersion:"v1.9.10", GitCommit:"098570796b32895c38a9a1c9286425fb1ececa18", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-08-02T17:19:54Z", GoVersion:"go1.9.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"10", GitVersion:"v1.10.0", GitCommit:"fc32d2f3698e36b93322a3465f63a14e9f0eaead", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-03-26T16:44:10Z", GoVersion:"go1.9.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration: minikube

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG API Machinery.
labels.name: sig/api-machinery

title: `ownerReferences` not correctly applied for `ResouceQuota` objects
